name: Ecos2015 : 28th International Conference on Efficiency, Cost, Optimization, Simulation and Environmental Impact of Energy Systems
description: The ECOS conferences have a long tradition in fostering the key aspects and the scientific knowledge that are essential to take into account the evolution of all the aspects of energy and its impacts.

location.place: ECOS 2015 will be held in Pau at the Historic Conference Centre “Palais Beaumont” http://www.pau-congres.com/ in the city center.
